subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Crash survivors like the American Tyler Farrar are relieved that the end is in sight. Friday’s stage was typical of their luck: a dog ran across the road, and a few riders fell.
snippet: Crash survivors like the American Tyler Farrar are relieved that the end is in sight. Friday’s stage was typical of their luck: a dog ran across the road, and a few riders fell.
